issue.title: [Rust] Reverse lookup for a key in DictionaryArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8591](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8591). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, there is no way to do a reverse lookup for DictionaryArray. A reverse lookup would be beneficial. (Enables creation of combiner masks)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8591?focusedCommentId=17094836) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7036
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7036>
